name: Overtime!
description:
Your company's going under, are you ready to work overtime?

Overtime! is a short "tower defense-like" management game made for the VimJam 2 : Boss [8 Bits to Infinity] game jam.

In Overtime! you play as the boss of a failing company. You have so little money that there are no walls, all of your work stations need repairing, and there's a water problem! Hire whacky employees with unique abilities to raise enough money by the deadline. Play through 10 waves of non stop problems and tight deadlines, this game is sure to keep you on the edge!

This is my first attempt at a game like this and the wave / character balance may be a bit off but if you play your cards right, you should have a fun 15 or so minutes of game time :)
